Missing.css Version 0.0.1

§ Changelog

This is the first ever release of missing.css. What is missing.css?

  • Classless CSS library
  • Utility classes.
  • Components.
  • Layout tools: Basic Grid, Text Columns, Full Bleed, Padding, Center, Fixed Positioning.
  • Customizable variables.
  • A Prism syntax theme.

Missing.css, by Deniz Akşimşek, funded by Big Sky Software and Commspace.

Also check out htmx and _hyperscript.

Made with 💙 in Ankara, Samsun, Rize and Cape Town.
